meter_reading.notes: Odometer wheels read 02271.1 (2271.1 m³). The red needle on the circular dial is positioned at the 7th small tick mark past 0.03, indicating 0.037 m³. The angle is calculated assuming 0.00 is at 0 degrees (12 o'clock) and each 0.01 increment is 36 degrees clockwise (3.7 * 36 = 133.2).
